short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple plugin that helps generate the LHS of a page given a sample size.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever pulling your hair out over inconsistent LHS test results?
Do you believe in the power of statistics?

This tool can help you run muiltiple tests asynchronously(with a bit of throttling, of course) for a given iterations and outputs the average / median scores in the end.

All that's required of you is just a little patience.

*This extension is still in beta stage. v0.4 now has some basic error handling. If you are a developer and want to see why your tests get hung up, you may inspect the popup before hitting the "Run sampler" button to see the network activity and console errors*
